testcase.name: Critical User Flows › Page loads without 404 errors for static resources
Critical User Flows › No console errors on page load
Critical User Flows › Authentication flow works correctly
Critical User Flows › QuickAdd modal opens and closes correctly
Critical User Flows › Task creation through QuickAdd works
Critical User Flows › Contact creation works without 403 errors
Critical User Flows › Web vitals and performance metrics load correctly
Critical User Flows › Forms show proper validation errors
Critical User Flows › User can navigate between main sections without errors
